title: ZTE’s new Axon Mini phone has a pressure sensitive screen, just like the iPhone 6S
text:

Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
ZTE has fully announced the Axon Mini, a smartphone it first teased back in July, and it comes with a pressure sensitive screen, just like t... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
